New Records: It was the first time in franchise history that the Diamondbacks lost a game in which they led by eight runs.
Key Match Events: The Diamondbacks took an 8-0 lead in the third inning but suffered a stunning 10-9 loss.
The Brewers achieved five straight hits with two outs to take the lead.
Post-Match Reflections: Diamondbacks manager Torey Lovullo commented on the bullpen struggles and potential workload factors, stating, 'There’s some big numbers out there, and I want to be mindful of that. But we’ve got [12] more games. It’s time to go. These guys will answer the bell.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Diamondbacks dropped to the third and final wild card spot in the National League after the loss.
The Diamondbacks bullpen had a major-league worst 6.84 bullpen ERA in September 2024.
The Diamondbacks have scored the most runs in baseball in 2024.
